Detailed Description

Wikipage

For the detail please see Tracker Software Development Wiki

Structure

The classes are classified into the following groups
  • tkdbc A class group for the geometry/assignment database
  • tkrec A class group for the cluster/hit/track reconstruction
  • tksim A class group for the cluster/signal simulation
